snippet.title: CREED: Rise to Glory - Announcement Teaser | PS VR
snippet.description:
PS Pre-Order: https://store.playstation.com/?resolve=UP2292-CUSA12801_00-CR1RELEASE000001 
For more information, visit: CreedRiseToGlory.com

Experience the pulse-pounding excitement of boxing with the cinematic thrill of a blockbuster movie in Creed: Rise to Glory™. Utilizing PlayStation VR and Move controllers, you are Adonis Creed fighting to establish your legacy in the ring and beyond. Go toe-to-toe with the world’s top opponents in an intense boxing experience that lets you train, fight, and win like a Creed.

http://CreedRiseToGlory.com

CREED © 2015 & CREED II © 2018 MGM & WBEI. CREED™ MGM.  CREED RISE TO GLORY™ & © 2018 MGM. ARR. ©2018 Survios and related logos are trademarks in the US and/or countries. All other trademarks cited herein are the property of their respective owners. Creed: Rise to Glory™ uses Phantom Melee™ technology. Phantom Melee is a trademark of Survios, Inc. in the United States and elsewhere. All rights reserved. The “PS” family logo and “PlayStation” are registered trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc. *Pre-Order gift only available in SCEA Regions. Visit CreedRiseToGlory.com for more information.
